name: Clown House (Palyaço Evi)
description: Freeware horror game with the mise en scène of an old black&white film and unique horror experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP2 or higher), Vista, 7, or 8 Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 2.2 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT / ATI Radeon HD 4770 Storage: 164 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 8 Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 2.4 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 280 / ATI Radeon HD 5830 Storage: 164 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I've spent about 13 hours of ACTUAL gameplay in this game. Of all of it, I encountered many glitches and discoveries of how the game REALLY works. The clowns that are going to be evil are pre marked. Meaning you can pull a gun out and start unleashing on a clown hoping it eventually would chace you. You can shoot through walls. Be warned since you might shoot an innocent clown on accident. CLOWNS WALK THROUGH WALLS, MAN. DO NOT TRY TO CAMP IT OUT THEY'LL WALK THROUGH THE WALL. All in all this game is fun. For two reasons:   REASON NUMBER JUAN: Glitches are fun to discover and mess with Who doesn't love shooting clowns in the face  Well, that wasn't an iconic review, now, was it? PROS: + Shoot clowns + Clowns sat down so long they forgot how to run + Glitches CONS: - This is a free game. Stop complaining and take your handout.  *EDIT 9/17/15* Of all the posted reviews I'm the only one even with a full hour in this game, sooooo my review must be so much better given I have 13 hours of experience  *EDIT 3/26/16* Yo where the hell Clown House 2 at?  *EDIT 10/3/16* This game has prepared us for this spooky clown thing going on, call to arms and shoot em through the walls!

Finally get in game 5 seconds in Immediately see a Clown sitting with a machete **SUDDEN DRAMATIC MUSIC** Clown starts walking towards me machete in hand **BLAM** Not today thank you.  Pretty much won the game in under 5 seconds. Got key and went for tea and biscuits.

Not really a game, kind of a 5 or 10 minute long tech demo. Pretty suspenseful and creepy, I don't have a particular fear of clowns but I was on edge. Oddly, the first time playing, the attack/jump scare didn't happen, but the second time, it did. Your mission is to explore these three rooms with clowns in them to find a key and escape. It's black and white and hard to see very far in any direction. One of the clowns will try to kill you, the rest will not. If you shoot the wrong one, you lose. I'd like to see this expanded on a bit. It's free and 10 minutes long, so it actually is worth your time unlike some other free nonsense on here.

This game is in a small room with three clowns, you have to find a key to escape. the key is in a random place each time. some clowns are evil and some arent. you have to decide which ones arent. if you shoot the nice ones you lose. this game is in fact short but very entertaining for a ftp game. it has a very disturbing atmosphere. I recommend it to anyone looking for a quick horror and puzzle fix!
